titleStmt.title: Severall orders and votes of both Houses of Parliament: made on Friday and Saturday last, for the bringing of the Kings Majesty to some of his houses neer London, to receive propositions from both kingdomes, for peace. And for the safety and security of the King, Parliament, city, and kingdome. With the copies of the letters from Sir Tho. Fairfax, to the Parliament, and the city. And a list of the names of the Committee of Safety.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: Severall orders and votes of both Houses of Parliament: made on Friday and Saturday last, for the bringing of the Kings Majesty to some of his houses neer London, to receive propositions from both kingdomes, for peace. And for the safety and security of the King, Parliament, city, and kingdome. With the copies of the letters from Sir Tho. Fairfax, to the Parliament, and the city. And a list of the names of the Committee of Safety.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: The votes and orders are dated 30-31 July 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
